message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,800 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $11,000. This is my final offer.
I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but I think that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'd appreciate it if you could meet me at that price.
